Specimen Type(s): Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) cervical punch biopsy tissue
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CINtec Histology immunohistochemical test using mouse monoclonal anti-p16 antibody for detection of p16INK4a protein in FFPE cervical tissue biopsies
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative immunohistochemistry test for p16INK4a protein in FFPE cervical punch biopsy tissues as an adjunct to H&E stained slide examination to improve consistency in diagnosing cervical intraepithelial neoplasia
